page.name: Shining Mantle of Destiny
page.description: Once upon a time, a great crusader of the Light donned this mantle; its brilliant glowing wings blinded his enemies with the power of truth and justice! This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: The Growing Darkness
page.description: The Mysterious Stranger's Super Ultra Mega Darkness Dracolich is growing... gathering all the spirits of darkness from the shadows in the world to block out the light!
